description.p: Deckr enhances your web browser by adding useful features to the browsers "New Tab" page. It works on the Chrome, Firefox and Safari web browsers.
Install this application and also install the Deckr browser extension found on the browser's extension store.
Deckr has a ton of useful features designed to make browsing the web fun again. There are currently 3 main tabs in the user interface.

ul.li: The Home tab lets you launch mini-apps for example: an AI Chatbot, an Image Editor, an Internet radio player and much more
The Bookmarks tab lets you create bookmark 'Decks' and share them with others online
The RSS reader tab lets you quickly find news stories from RSS feeds around the world
Replaces the browsers "New Tab" page with the Deckr application user interface
Create, share and download bookmark decks online
Tons of build in links to popular sites
Easy access to the native browser's bookmarks
Data stored locally in the desktop application. The application acts as a private cloud and it runs silently in the background.
Lots more features and more added every month. Install it and give it a try.

description.p: Deckr is a background application that operates through the system tray. For GNOME desktop users (Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora), you need an AppIndicator extension to see the system tray icon:
Install this extension if you don't see the system tray icon on the top right of the menubar
